topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b48966636872707a050c00#post_54b48966636872707a050c00
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]And everyone is posting fast.[/bq]
Here's a challenge for everyone; take exactly a minute to type out whatever and let's see how fast everyone can type.  I'm starting at exactly 9:02


Today I finally found a let's play of Guilty Gear XRD; I so wish for this game to come out to the PC as I have been waiting for this game for quite a while as I love the guilty gear franchise and think it's one of the best fighting game franchises and I have been so far quite entertained and think it's interesting.

In other news my learning C# isn't going well as I have learned how bad my education at my old college was and that the purpose of the college was pretty much to push businesses and so forth not actually educating students unless they joined the organizations and such to which considering the teachers were a part of the IDGA I couldn't ethically stand for such a organization.

Also I have gotten quite bored of minecraft as even the mods are not showing me any fun because a lot of the mods have the same thing; why are there fifty different mods in ftb packs if they all do the same thing?  It seems as though eventually ftb is going to lose popularity when 1.8 comes out due to the poor optimization of minecraft and personally I think minecraft will start losing popularity in the long run because of the poor decisions as of late because it's moving towards poor optimization which is unsound business decisions in the long run.  I always knew Mojang was a one hit wonder and now it looks like the one hit wonder is over.


Done.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
